Activity_11pqrrd.name: Activity_11pqrrd
Activity_11pqrrd.script:
# If Learning and Development, check if any of the requested items are books
# This needs to remain
if ndr_details["category"] == "learn_and_dev":
    non_book_check_cnt = len([x for x in ndr_details["item"] if x["sub_category"] != "books"])

# If Equipment, check if any item exceeded the threshold
if ndr_details["category"] == "equip":
    request_exceeds_threshold = len([x for x in ndr_details["item"] if x["exceeds_threshold"]]) > 0

# Set/Clear Last Approval Outcome
last_approval_outcome = ""

}

Activity_0rm0qow.name: Activity_0rm0qow
Activity_0rm0qow.script:
# Set Outcome Status
if last_approval_outcome == "app":
    ndr_details["status"] = "Approved"
elif last_approval_outcome == "rej":
    ndr_details["status"] = "Rejected"
else:
    ndr_details["status"] = "Unknown"


# Get Process Instance
process_info = get_process_info()
process_instance_id = process_info["process_instance_id"]
process_instance_id_str = str(process_instance_id)
del(process_info)

extensions.instructionsForEndUser:
--- **Requestor**: {{ ndr_details["requestor"] }} --- | Project | Category | Criticality | Preferred Delivery Date | Vendor Name | Payment Method | | -------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | | {{ ndr_details["project_name"] }} | {{ ndr_details["category_name"] }} | {{ ndr_details["criticality"] }} | {{ ndr_details["period_display"] }} | {{ ndr_details["vendor"] }} | {{ ndr_details["payment_method_name"] }} | ---------- | | | | --------------: | -------------------------------- | |**Purpose** | {{ ndr_details["purpose"] }} | ---------- ### Items | Item | Sub-Category | Qty | Currency | Unit Price | Total Price | USD Price | Total USD Price | | ---- | ----------------- | :---: | :---------: | ----------: | ------------: | -----------: | -----------------: | {% for icnt in range(item_list_total) %} | {{ ndr_details["item"][icnt]["item_name"] }} | {{ ndr_details["item"][icnt]["sub_category_name"] }} | {{ ndr_details["item"][icnt]["qty"] }} | {{ ndr_details["item"][icnt]["currency"] }} | {{ "{:,.2f}".format(ndr_details["item"][icnt]["unit_price_num"]) }} | {{ "{:,.2f}".format(ndr_details["item"][icnt]["unit_price_total"]) }} | {{ "{:,.2f}".format(ndr_details["item"][icnt]["converted_to_unit_price"]) }} | {{ "{:,.2f}".format(ndr_details["item"][icnt]["converted_to_unit_price_total"]) }} | {% endfor %} ---------- ### Total Request: {{ "{:,.2f}".format(ndr_details["total_request_amount_usd"]) }} USD* *Exchange Rates used to calculate the "USD" amounts are under license from Xe. Please note that if you use this Xe Data, you are obliged to comply with Xe's end terms of use. ---------- {% if is_additional_information %} ### Reviewer Additional Information Request | Requested by |
Date
|
Time
| Additional Information Requested | | ----------------- | ----- | ----- | -------------------------------------- | | {{ nai_reviewer_comment["Reviewer Role"] }} | {{ nai_reviewer_comment["Reviewer Comment Date"] }} | {{ nai_reviewer_comment["Reviewer Comment Time"] }} | {{ nai_reviewer_comment["Reviewer Comment"] }} | --- {% endif %}

Activity_1eznkkn.name: Activity_1eznkkn
Activity_1eznkkn.script:
# If no addtion details were provided, set more_details to blank
try:
    supporting_information
except NameError:
    supporting_information = ""

# Determine if additional details were provided
is_supporting_information = len(supporting_information) > 0


# if Supporting INformation, Remove any linefeeds
if is_supporting_information:
    supporting_information_double = supporting_information
    supporting_information_single = supporting_information_double.replace("\n\n", " ")
    supporting_information = supporting_information_single.replace("\n", " ")
    del(supporting_information_double)
    del(supporting_information_single)

# Add Supporting Information to Details
ndr_details["supporting_information"] = supporting_information
del(supporting_information)

# Check if any Supporting Files were uploaded
try:
    supporting_files
except NameError:
    is_supporting_files = False
else:
    is_supporting_files = True

# Set Cancel State
## Set variable for the request cancellation
if requestor_proceed_option == "Cancel the Request":
    cancelled_request = True
else :
    cancelled_request = False

Activity_08afpy3.name: Activity_08afpy3
Activity_08afpy3.postscript:
# Check for optional responses 
if ndr_details["vendor"] == "":
  ndr_details["vendor"] = "Optional - No Entry"

if ndr_details["payment_method"] == "":
    ndr_details["payment_method"] = "Optional - No Entry"

# Get Project Label
temp_project_name = [x["label"] for x in dept_enum_list if x["value"] == ndr_details["project"]]
ndr_details["project_name"] = temp_project_name[0]
del(temp_project_name)

# Get Category Label
temp_category_name = [x["label"] for x in category_enum_list if x["value"] == ndr_details["category"]]
ndr_details["category_name"] = temp_category_name[0]
del(temp_category_name)

# Get Payment Method Label
if ndr_details["payment_method"] != "Optional - No Entry":
    temp_payment_method = [x["label"] for x in pay_method_enum_list if x["value"] == ndr_details["payment_method"]]
    ndr_details["payment_method_name"] = temp_payment_method[0]
    del(temp_payment_method)
else:
    ndr_details["payment_method_name"] = ndr_details["payment_method"]

# Remove any linefeeds from from Purpose
purpose_double = ndr_details["purpose"]
purpose_single = purpose_double.replace("\n\n", " ")
purpose_removed = purpose_single.replace("\n", " ")
ndr_details["purpose"] = purpose_removed
del(purpose_double)
del(purpose_single)
del(purpose_removed)

# Set Period (Preferred Delivery Date) Display Date Format
ndr_details["period_display"] = ndr_details["period"][8:10] + "-" + ndr_details["period"][5:7] + "-" + ndr_details["period"][:4]

# Get Frontend URL
frontend_url = get_frontend_url()

extensions.instructionsForEndUser:
The complete list of categories and sub-categories you can raise this request for can be found here. The process overview is available in the process README.md and in Notion. --- {% if is_additional_information %} ### Reviewer Additional Information Request | Requested by |
Date
|
Time
| Additional Information Requested | | ----------------- | ----- | ----- | -------------------------------------- | | {{ nai_reviewer_comment["Reviewer Role"] }} | {{ nai_reviewer_comment["Reviewer Comment Date"] }} | {{ nai_reviewer_comment["Reviewer Comment Time"] }} | {{ nai_reviewer_comment["Reviewer Comment"] }} | --- {% endif %}
extensions.postScript:
# Check for optional responses 
if ndr_details["vendor"] == "":
  ndr_details["vendor"] = "Optional - No Entry"

if ndr_details["payment_method"] == "":
    ndr_details["payment_method"] = "Optional - No Entry"

# Get Project Label
temp_project_name = [x["label"] for x in dept_enum_list if x["value"] == ndr_details["project"]]
ndr_details["project_name"] = temp_project_name[0]
del(temp_project_name)

# Get Category Label
temp_category_name = [x["label"] for x in category_enum_list if x["value"] == ndr_details["category"]]
ndr_details["category_name"] = temp_category_name[0]
del(temp_category_name)

# Get Payment Method Label
if ndr_details["payment_method"] != "Optional - No Entry":
    temp_payment_method = [x["label"] for x in pay_method_enum_list if x["value"] == ndr_details["payment_method"]]
    ndr_details["payment_method_name"] = temp_payment_method[0]
    del(temp_payment_method)
else:
    ndr_details["payment_method_name"] = ndr_details["payment_method"]

# Remove any linefeeds from from Purpose
purpose_double = ndr_details["purpose"]
purpose_single = purpose_double.replace("\n\n", " ")
purpose_removed = purpose_single.replace("\n", " ")
ndr_details["purpose"] = purpose_removed
del(purpose_double)
del(purpose_single)
del(purpose_removed)

# Set Period (Preferred Delivery Date) Display Date Format
ndr_details["period_display"] = ndr_details["period"][8:10] + "-" + ndr_details["period"][5:7] + "-" + ndr_details["period"][:4]

# Get Frontend URL
frontend_url = get_frontend_url()

# Delete Unneeded Variable
del(frontend_url)

Activity_0a92bmr.name: Activity_0a92bmr
Activity_0a92bmr.script:
# Set Item Unit Price to Numeric Value
ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["unit_price_num"] = float((ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["unit_price"]).replace(',', ''))

# Set Sub-Category Name
if ndr_details["category"] == "soft_and_lic":
	temp_sub_category_name = [x["label"] for x in soft_lic_sub_category_enum_list if x["value"] == ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["sub_category"]]
elif ndr_details["category"] == "equip":
	temp_sub_category_name = [x["label"] for x in equip_sub_category_enum_list if x["value"] == ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["sub_category"]]
elif ndr_details["category"] == "learn_and_dev":
	temp_sub_category_name = [x["label"] for x in learn_dev_sub_category_enum_list if x["value"] == ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["sub_category"]]
elif ndr_details["category"] == "consult_fees":
	temp_sub_category_name = [x["label"] for x in consult_fees_sub_category_enum_list if x["value"] == ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["sub_category"]]
elif ndr_details["category"] == "other_fees":
	temp_sub_category_name = [x["label"] for x in other_fees_sub_category_enum_list if x["value"] == ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["sub_category"]]

ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["sub_category_name"] = temp_sub_category_name[0]
del(temp_sub_category_name)

# Get Currency Type Label
temp_currency_type_name = [x["label"] for x in currency_type_enum_list if x["value"] == ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["currency_type"]]
ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["currency_type_name"] = temp_currency_type_name[0]
del(temp_currency_type_name)

Activity_0fks0bx.name: Activity_0fks0bx
Activity_0fks0bx.script:
# Calculate total UDS anount
converted_to_unit_price_total_sum = sum(v.get('converted_to_unit_price_total', 0) for v in ndr_details["item"])
converted_to_unit_price_total_sum_rounded = round(converted_to_unit_price_total_sum, 2)
ndr_details["total_request_amount_usd"] = converted_to_unit_price_total_sum_rounded

# Delete Unneeded Variable
if is_xe:
    del(xe_amount)
    del(xe_convert_from)
    del(xe_convert_from_currency)
    del(xe_convert_to_currency)
    del(xe_decimal_places)

del(exceeds_threshold)
del(item_list_cnt)
del(is_xe)
del(converted_to_unit_price_total_sum)
del(converted_to_unit_price_total_sum_rounded)
del(process_instance_id_str)

# Set Xe Conversion Parameters

xe_convert_to_currency = "USD"
xe_amount = ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["unit_price_num"]
xe_decimal_places = 2

del(xe_amount)

Activity_1elarcf.name: Activity_1elarcf
Activity_1elarcf.script:
# Get Process Instance
process_info = get_process_info()
process_instance_id = process_info["process_instance_id"]
process_instance_id_str = str(process_instance_id)
del(process_info)

# Add Process Instance Id, for Postgres extract
ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["process_instance_id"] = process_instance_id_str

# Add Unit Price Total
ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["unit_price_total"] = round(ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["qty"] * ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["unit_price_num"], 2)
ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["converted_to_currency"] = "USD"

# If selected, add Fiat conversion info
if ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["currency_type"] == "fiat":
    ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["converted_to_unit_price"] = round(xe_convert_from["to"][0]["mid"], 2)
    ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["xe_usd_mid"] = xe_convert_from["to"][0]["mid"]
    ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["xe_usd_mid_date"] = local_date_str
    ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["cg_usd_mid_time"] = local_time_str
    del(xe_convert_from)

# If selected, add Crypto conversion info
if ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["currency_type"] == "crypto":
    ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["converted_to_unit_price"] = round(cg_usd_conversion_rate * ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["unit_price_num"], 2)
    ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["cg_usd_conversion_rate"] = cg_usd_conversion_rate
    ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["cg_usd_conversion_rate_date"] = local_date_str
    ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["cg_usd_conversion_rate_time"] = local_time_str

ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["converted_to_unit_price_total"] = round(ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["qty"] * ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["converted_to_unit_price"], 2)

# Delete Unneeded Variables
del(local_date_str)
del(local_time_str)
Activity_1elarcf.description: Set Item Amount for Currency Conversion

# Increase Item Id
ndr_details["item"][item_list_cnt]["item_id"] = item_list_cnt + 1

# Increase Item Count
item_list_cnt = item_list_cnt + 1

# Delete variables
del(threshold_category)

del(exceeds_check_unit_price)

Activity_0b2sysj.name: Activity_0b2sysj
Activity_0b2sysj.script:
# Create Details Dictionary
ndr_details = {}

# Set Requestor First, Last and Preferred Names
ndr_details["requestor_first_name"] = bamboo_get_employee["firstName"]
ndr_details["requestor_last_name"] = bamboo_get_employee["lastName"]
ndr_details["requestor_preferred_name"] = bamboo_get_employee["preferredName"]

# Set Requestor Full and Greet Names
if bamboo_get_employee["preferredName"] is None:
    ndr_details["requestor"] = bamboo_get_employee["firstName"] + " " + bamboo_get_employee["lastName"]
    ndr_details["requestor_greet_name"] = bamboo_get_employee["firstName"]

else:
    ndr_details["requestor"] = bamboo_get_employee["preferredName"] + " " + bamboo_get_employee["lastName"]
    ndr_details["requestor_greet_name"] = bamboo_get_employee["preferredName"]

# Set Requestor Ids
ndr_details["requestor_status_key"] = bamboo_get_employee["customStatusChatKey"]
ndr_details["requestor_bamboo_eid"] = bamboo_get_employee["id"]
ndr_details["requestor_auth_username"] = auth_user_info["username"]

# Set Global Variables
# is_global_supporting_files_uploaded = False

del( bamboo_get_employee)
del(auth_user_info)

# Set Approver List
ndr_approvers = []
last_approval_outcome = ""

# Set Reviewer Comments List
review_comment_list = []
review_comment_cnt = 0

# Set Defalt reviewer Comment
nai_reviewer_comment = {}
nai_reviewer_comment["Reviewer Comment"] = ""

# Add additional variables
is_supporting_files = False
is_supporting_information = False
is_additional_information = False
# SupportFileColumns = ["pi_id", "supporting_files"]
non_book_check_cnt = 0

extensions.instructionsForEndUser: Welcome, let's get started by getting your imformation from Bamboo

Activity_17jri7r.name: Activity_17jri7r
Activity_17jri7r.script:
# Determine index of last Reviewer Comment
review_comment_cnt = len(review_comment_list)
nai_index = review_comment_cnt - 1

# Get Last Reviewer's Greet Name
reviewer_greet_names = {k: v["Greet Name"] for d in ndr_approvers for k, v in d.items()}
last_reviewer = review_comment_list[nai_index]["Reviewer"]
last_reviewer_greet_name = reviewer_greet_names[last_reviewer]

# Get Last Reviewer Comment 
nai_reviewer_comment = {}
nai_reviewer_comment["Reviewer Role"] = last_reviewer
nai_reviewer_comment["Reviewer Comment Date"] = local_date_str
nai_reviewer_comment["Reviewer Comment Time"] = local_time_str
nai_reviewer_comment["Reviewer Comment"] = review_comment_list[nai_index]["Reviewer Comment"]

# Set Variable to Indicate Addition Information has been Requested
is_additional_information = True

# Reset Requester's Supporting Information
supporting_information = ndr_details["supporting_information"]

del(local_date_str)
del(local_time_str)

Activity_0liwwgp.name: Activity_0liwwgp
Activity_0liwwgp.script:
# Set if no comment entered
try:
    reviewer_comment
except NameError:
    reviewer_comment = ""

if len(reviewer_comment) > 0:
    reviewer_comment_double = reviewer_comment
    reviewer_comment_single = reviewer_comment_double.replace("\n\n", " ")
    reviewer_comment = reviewer_comment_single.replace("\n", " ")
    del(reviewer_comment_double)
    del(reviewer_comment_single)
    reviewer_comment_details = {}
    reviewer_comment_details["Reviewer"] = current_approver_role + " (" + current_approver_greet_name + ")"
    reviewer_comment_details["Reviewer Comment Date"] = local_date_str
    reviewer_comment_details["Reviewer Comment Time"] = local_time_str
    reviewer_comment_details["Reviewer Comment"] = reviewer_comment
    review_comment_list.append(reviewer_comment_details)

review_comment_cnt = len(review_comment_list)

# Reset Reviewer Comment
reviewer_comment = ""

# Delete Unneeded Variables
del(local_date_str)
del(local_time_str)
del(current_approver_greet_name)

Activity_0ddk4hx.name: Activity_0ddk4hx
Activity_0ddk4hx.prescript:
# Get SME Group Members
sme_group_members = get_group_members(current_approver_role)

# Set to False initially
is_approval_rejected = False
reviewer_outcome = ""

# Set Approval Options
review_options = [
    {
        "label": "Approved",
        "value": "app"
    },
    {
        "label": "Need Additional Information",
        "value": "nai"
    }
]

# Add Review Option if PPG BA
if current_approver_role == "PPG BA":
    ppg_ba_review_option = { 
        "label": "CP is Approved",
        "value": "cpa"
    }
    review_options.append(ppg_ba_review_option)
    del(ppg_ba_review_option)

# Add Reject Option for all but Legal
if current_approver_role != "Legal":
    reject_review_option = {
        "label": "Rejected",
        "value": "rej"
    }
    review_options.append(reject_review_option)
    del(reject_review_option)

# Set Status Keys
ndr_message_status_keys = [x["Status Key "] for x in potential_sme_approvers]

# Delete Unneeded Variables
del(bamboo_sme_list)
del(sme_group_members_cnt)
del(sme_group_members_loop_cnt)
del(bamboo_sme_ids_extracted)

del(potential_sme_approvers)
del(review_options)
del(ndr_message_status_keys)

extensions.preScript:
# Get SME Group Members
sme_group_members = get_group_members(current_approver_role)

# Set to False initially
is_approval_rejected = False
reviewer_outcome = ""

# Set Approval Options
review_options = [
    {
        "label": "Approved",
        "value": "app"
    },
    {
        "label": "Need Additional Information",
        "value": "nai"
    }
]

# Add Review Option if PPG BA
if current_approver_role == "PPG BA":
    ppg_ba_review_option = { 
        "label": "CP is Approved",
        "value": "cpa"
    }
    review_options.append(ppg_ba_review_option)
    del(ppg_ba_review_option)

# Add Reject Option for all but Legal
if current_approver_role != "Legal":
    reject_review_option = {
        "label": "Rejected",
        "value": "rej"
    }
    review_options.append(reject_review_option)
    del(reject_review_option)

# Set Status Keys
ndr_message_status_keys = [x["Status Key "] for x in potential_sme_approvers]

# Delete Unneeded Variables
del(bamboo_sme_list)
del(sme_group_members_cnt)
del(sme_group_members_loop_cnt)
del(bamboo_sme_ids_extracted)

Activity_1erjpk8.postscript:
# Set SME Information
sme = {}
sme["Bamboo EId"] = bamboo_get_employee["id"]
sme["Status Key"] = bamboo_get_employee["customStatusChatKey"]
sme["First Name"] = bamboo_get_employee["firstName"]
sme["Preferred Name"] = bamboo_get_employee["preferredName"]
sme["Outcome"] = last_approval_outcome
if bamboo_get_employee["preferredName"] is None:
    sme["Greet Name"] = bamboo_get_employee["firstName"]
else:
    sme["Greet Name"] = bamboo_get_employee["preferredName"]

# Set Curent Approver Great Name
current_approver_greet_name = sme["Greet Name"]

# Set NDR Current Approver
ndr_current_approver = current_approver_role + " (" + current_approver_greet_name + ")"

# Set Approver
approver = {}
approver[ndr_current_approver] = sme

# Set Approvers
ndr_approvers.append(approver)

# Delecte Unneeded Variables
del(approver)
del(sme)
del(ndr_current_approver)
del(bamboo_get_employee)
del(which_bamboo_employee_data_rule)
del(last_human_task)

Waku_Messages_Message-Raise_New_Demand_R.name: Waku_Messages_Message-Raise_New_Demand_Request

Activity_0luqrao.name: Activity_0luqrao
Activity_0luqrao.script:
# Set variables based on DMN table
# Initialize variables
waku_message_variables = ""
wm_var_cnt = 0

if is_wmv_project:
    waku_message_variables = waku_message_variables + "\n**Project**: " + ndr_details["project_name"]
    wm_var_cnt = wm_var_cnt + 1

if is_wmv_category:
    if wm_var_cnt > 0:
        waku_message_variables + "\n,"
    waku_message_variables = waku_message_variables + "\n**Category**: " + ndr_details["category_name"]
    wm_var_cnt = wm_var_cnt + 1

if is_wmv_amount:
    if wm_var_cnt > 0:
        waku_message_variables + "\n,"
    waku_message_variables = waku_message_variables + "\n**Total Price**: "  + str("{:,.2f}".format(ndr_details["total_request_amount_usd"])) + " USD"
    wm_var_cnt = wm_var_cnt + 1

if is_wmv_criticality:
    if wm_var_cnt > 0:
        waku_message_variables + "\n,"
    waku_message_variables = waku_message_variables + "\n**Criticality**: "  + ndr_details["criticality"] 
    wm_var_cnt = wm_var_cnt + 1

if is_wmv_status:
    if wm_var_cnt > 0:
        waku_message_variables + "\n,"
    waku_message_variables = waku_message_variables + "\nStatus placeholder"
    wm_var_cnt = wm_var_cnt + 1

if is_wmv_requestor:
    if wm_var_cnt > 0:
        waku_message_variables + "\n,"
    waku_message_variables = waku_message_variables + "\n**Requested by**: " + ndr_details["requestor"]
    wm_var_cnt = wm_var_cnt + 1

if is_wmv_reason:
    if wm_var_cnt > 0:
        waku_message_variables + "\n,"
    waku_message_variables = waku_message_variables + "\n**Reason**: " + nai_reviewer_comment["Reviewer Comment"]
    wm_var_cnt = wm_var_cnt + 1

if is_wmv_reviewer:
    if wm_var_cnt > 0:
        waku_message_variables + "\n,"
    waku_message_variables = waku_message_variables + "\n**Reviewed by**: " + last_reviewer_greet_name
    wm_var_cnt = wm_var_cnt + 1

# Delete Unneeded Variable
del(is_wmv_project)
del(is_wmv_category)
del(is_wmv_amount)
del(is_wmv_criticality)
del(is_wmv_status)
del(is_wmv_requestor)
del(is_wmv_reason)
del(is_wmv_reviewer)
del(wm_var_cnt)

output_entries.text: "Hi " + budget_owner["Greet Name"] + ", a new Request has been submitted for your approval. You can find all the details about this Request by clicking the link below. Please go through the request form and confirm your approval.\n"

"Hi " + current_approver_role + " team, a new Request has been submitted for your review. You can find all the details about this Request by clicking the link below. Please go through the request form and confirm your review.\n"

"Hi PeopleOps Talent team, a new Request for a new role has been approved. You can start working on the Job description with the Hiring manager <Hiring manager>. You can find all the details about this new Request by clicking the link below. Please go through the request form and submit the Job description.\n"

"Hi PeopleOps Partner, a new Request for a new role has been approved. You can find all the details about this Request by clicking the link below. Please go through the request form and submit the role's Level, Function, and Compensation rates.\n"

"Hi Finance team, a new Request for a new role has been approved. You can find all the details about this Request by clicking the link below. Please go through the request form and confirm budget adjustments.\n"
"Hi PeopleOps Talent team, a new Request for a new role is ready for publishing. You can find all the details about this Request by clicking on the link below.\n"

"Hi " + ndr_details["requestor_greet_name"] + ", **ADDITIONAL INFO REQUIRED** for your new Request.  " + "

You can find all the details about this Request by clicking the link below. Please go through the request form and submit the requested info.
"

"Hi " + ndr_details["requestor_greet_name"] + ", your new Request has been **REJECTED**.  " + "

You can find all the details about this Request by clicking the link below.
"

"Hi " + ndr_details["requestor_greet_name"] + ", your new Request has been **APPROVED**.  " + "

You can find all the details about this Request by clicking the link below. Please proceed with the Vendor Onboarding procedures, and check with the Legal team if the Contract negotiation stage needs to be initiated.
"
"Something is wrong with the Message Body text-2.  Contact Support\n"
